sys_app_scan_payload.serialized_record:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_ux_page_property"><sys_ux_page_property action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choices/><description/><name>chrome_header</name><page display_value="">!!!sys_id_2058!!!</page><required_translations>[{"message":"Display Preferences","comment":""},{"message":"Show sidebar","comment":""},{"message":"Show ribbon","comment":""},{"message":"Notifications","comment":""},{"message":"Show Banners","comment":""},{"message":"Logout","comment":""},{"message":"Show Badge Count","comment":""},{"message":"UserMenu","comment":""},{"message":"Wrap list text","comment":""},{"message":"Settings","comment":""}]</required_translations><route/><suffix/><sys_class_name>sys_ux_page_property</sys_class_name><sys_created_by/><sys_created_on/><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>global</sys_domain_path><sys_id>!!!sys_id_2057!!!</sys_id><sys_mod_count/><sys_name/><sys_package display_value="">!!!app_sys_id!!!</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="">!!!app_sys_id!!!</sys_scope><sys_update_name/><sys_updated_by/><sys_updated_on/><type>json</type><unique_name>!!!scope_name!!!.!!!sys_id_2058!!!.root.chrome_header</unique_name><value>{
  "privatePage": {
    "notificationsEnabled": false,
    "searchEnabled": true,
    "userPrefsEnabled": true,   
    "globalTools": {
      "collapsingMenuId": 0,
      "primaryItems": [
        {
          "label": "UserMenu",
          "icon": "user",
          "type": "menu",
          "primaryDisplay": "icon",
          "value": {
            "children": [
              {
                "label": "Settings",
                "type": "menu",
                "position": 50,
                "value": {
                  "children": [
                    {
                      "label": "Display Preferences",
                      "type": "divider"
                    },
                    {
                      "label": "Show ribbon",
                      "type": "toggle",
                      "value": {
                        "_meta": {
                          "_type": "userPreferences",
                          "_path": "userPrefName",
                          "_value": {
                            "userPrefName": "workspace.showRibbon"
                          },
                          "_default": {
                            "userPrefName": "true"
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    },
                    {
                      "label": "Show sidebar",
                      "type": "toggle",
                      "value": {
                        "_meta": {
                          "_type": "userPreferences",
                          "_path": "userPrefName",
                          "_value": {
                            "userPrefName": "workspace.showAgentAssist"
                          },
                          "_default": {
                            "userPrefName": "true"
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    },
                    {
                      "label": "Wrap list text",
                      "type": "toggle",
                      "value": {
                        "_meta": {
                          "_type": "userPreferences",
                          "_path": "userPrefName",
                          "_value": {
                            "userPrefName": "workspace.wrapListText"
                          },
                          "_default": {
                            "userPrefName": "true"
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    },
                    {
                      "label": "Notifications",
                      "type": "divider"
                    },
                    {
                      "label": "Show Banners",
                      "type": "toggle",
                      "value": {
                        "_meta": {
                          "_type": "userPreferences",
                          "_path": "userPrefName",
                          "_value": {
                            "userPrefName": "workspace.notifications.showPopups"
                          },
                          "_default": {
                            "userPrefName": "true"
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    },
                    {
                      "label": "Show Badge Count",
                      "type": "toggle",
                      "value": {
                        "_meta": {
                          "_type": "userPreferences",
                          "_path": "userPrefName",
                          "_value": {
                            "userPrefName": "workspace.notifications.showBadgeCount"
                          },
                          "_default": {
                            "userPrefName": "true"
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  ]
                }
              },
              {
                "label": "Logout",
                "type": "navigation",
                "position": 200,
                "value": {
                  "value": {
                    "href": "/logout.do"
                  },
                  "type": "external"
                }
              }
            ]
          }
        }
      ],
      "secondaryItems": []
    }
  },
  "publicPage": {
    "actionButtons": []
  }
}</value></sys_ux_page_property><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=null"/></record_update>
